seller_description: The Boldfit EVA Yoga Mat is a premium, all-purpose workout mat designed for comfort and durability. Measuring 6 feet long and 2 feet wide (183 cm x 61 cm), this 4mm thick mat is ideal for people of all shapes and sizes, providing excellent cushioning for the spine, hips, knees, and elbows on hard floors. Suitable for both men and women, it comes with a convenient strap for easy transportation and storage, allowing you to carry it effortlessly and showcase it with style. With double-sided non-slip surfaces, the mat offers superior grip, preventing injuries and ensuring confidence during poses. The textured top prevents slipping of hands and feet, while the wavy anti-skid bottom keeps the mat securely in place, making it perfect for intense asanas or simple stretches like surya namaskar. Crafted from durable EVA material, this mat is free from toxic substances and outlasts traditional plasticky mats. Its sweat-resistant and moisture-resistant technology makes it easy to clean with soap and water, ensuring a hygienic workout experience every time.
review: This mat is very useful for those who are doing yoga and exercise regularly. This mat is very comfortable, well design and versatile also. Quality of mat is very nice. It is not a waste of money. It's easy to carry with their carrying strips. It's easy to fold and light weight. This is useful for all age group people, even though not a problem with color
expected-output: The seller's description of the Boldfit EVA Yoga Mat highlights it as a durable, all-purpose mat designed for yoga and exercise, suitable for people of all shapes and sizes. It emphasizes comfort, non-slip features, and the convenience of portability with carrying straps. The mat is described as being made from high-quality EVA material, sweat-resistant, easy to clean, and free of toxic substances, ensuring a hygienic and long-lasting product. The buyer's review aligns well with the seller's description, expressing satisfaction with the mat's comfort, design, versatility, and quality. The buyer also appreciates the ease of carrying and storing the mat. While the buyer mentions not a problem with color, this does not reflect dissatisfaction but rather an acknowledgment of a non-issue. There are no discrepancies between the seller's description and the buyer's experience, indicating that the product met or exceeded the buyer's expectations.
label: 1:Here buyer agreed with the seller
